name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Backend Developer with 8 years of experience, specializing in building high-performance backend solutions using **Java**, **Kotlin**, and the **Spring Framework**. Proficient in working with relational databases such as **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, I have a solid understanding of **microservices** architecture and best practices for scalable application development. My technical expertise is complemented by a strong foundation in **AWS cloud services**, along with version control using **Git** and build automation with **Gradle**.

In addition to backend development, I hold experience in full-stack technologies including **Python**, which allows for versatile integration in diverse project settings. I am skilled in implementing continuous integration and deployment strategies, ensuring adherence to industry compliance standards. Known for effective communication and collaboration, I thrive in team environments to deliver secure and efficient solutions.
